rows.label: qst104901_msg0001
rows.name: Ohh, at last, a dashing gentleman!

rows.label: qst104901_msg0002
rows.name:
Your splendor... It touches me in
ways I could not imagine!

rows.label: qst104901_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh...forgive me. It's just that I've been
holed up in my house for so long,
I can't resist it if I see a pretty face...

rows.label: qst104901_msg0004
rows.name: I, er...I'm writing a book, you see.

rows.label: qst104901_msg0005
rows.name: It's on the topic of beautiful flowers.

rows.label: qst104901_msg0006
rows.name:
I would desperately love to incorporate
the ice flowers that bloom nearby, but
the monsters make it nigh impossible.

rows.label: qst104901_msg0007
rows.name:
You...you'd help me? Oh, this is
wonderful news!

rows.label: qst104901_msg0008
rows.name:
Ohh, to think the day would come that
I would get to speak to such a fetching
individual... How your light dazzles...

rows.label: qst104901_msg0102
rows.name:
If only a dashing gentleman would talk
to me and warm my heart from within...
